Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as Orwellian and a threat to freedom of expression.
The government is perceived to have double standards, with different rules for themselves and the public.
Concerns about censorship and punishment for challenging government narratives.
Belief that governments should also be held accountable for misinformation.
Notable Quotes: I believe this legislation is Orwellian in its current form and both the Federal and State governments want to play big brother and completely censor us and shut down freedom of expression.
We the people will be subjected to big brother scrutiny and shut down if we should challenge government officials etc.
I firmly believe we should not be legislating free speech at all!
